selectedVerses.text: They lay hold on bow and javelin; they are cruel and have no mercy; the sound of them is like the roaring sea; they ride on horses, set in array as a man for battle, against you, O daughter of Zion!"
You have turned cruel to me; with the might of your hand you persecute me.
their wine is the poison of serpents and the cruel venom of asps.
Wrath is cruel, anger is overwhelming, but who can stand before jealousy?
Rescue me, O my God, from the hand of the wicked, from the grasp of the unjust and cruel man.
